nodes.text: The Veragi system was located in the Veragi sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The Veragi Trade Route hyperlane connected it to the Trassitan system as well as the Julevian system of the neighboring Dalonbian sector. Another hyperspace route linked the Veragi system to the Plesstil system. It shared its name with the starship known as the Ghost Ship of Veragi.
The Veragi system was introduced in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square L-3.
